proposal: Hey PancakeSwap community! I see you've been flipping pancakes and making waves in the DeFi ecosystem with over 1.7M community members and 8345 holders on BSC network. Impressive! We offer a range of B2B tools that could further enrich your platform, like creating your own DEX or even a blockchain-based lottery. Interested in adding more layers to your pancake stack? See my profile for demo and details.
